00122         int i;
00123         for (i= 0; i < num_faces; i++) {

00125             int col = i%4;
00126             if (col == 0) {
00127                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_SPECULAR,mat_spec1);
00128             } else
